channel.title: Autotyper when a button is pressed (ie: F7)
channel.description: I am looking for a tutorial/code/program which allows me to type in something, and every time i press a button it says it.

item.source: Autotyper when a button is pressed (ie: F7)

item.title: Autotyper when a button is pressed (ie: F7)
item.dc:creator: @hellou hellou
item.description:
@hellou wrote:

Heres another way abit more coding but still works:-

Private Declare Function GetAsyncKeyState Lib “user32” (ByVal vKey As Long) As Integer

Private Sub Timer1_Timer()
If GetAsyncKeyState(vbKeyF7) Then
SendKeys Text1.text
End If
End Sub

Make a timer with a interval 500.

Read full topic
item.source: Autotyper when a button is pressed (ie: F7)

item.title: Autotyper when a button is pressed (ie: F7)
item.dc:creator: @Texasmd91 Texasmd91
item.description:
@Texasmd91 wrote:

[quote=“hellou, post:2, topic:67881”]What language? For vb6 its

Private Sub Text1_KeyDown(KeyCode As Integer, Shift As Integer)
If KeyCode = vbKeyF7 Then
SendKeys (Text1.Text)
End If
End Sub[/quote]
thnx
ill reply if it doesnt work[br][size=1]Posted on: March 15, 2007, 03:25:27 PM[/size][hr]Yeah, it didnt work.

It only worked if it was in the same form that i was trying to do it in, so i couldn’t go in notepad and do it

Read full topic

item.title: Autotyper when a button is pressed (ie: F7)
item.dc:creator: @hellou hellou
item.description:
@hellou wrote:

What language? For vb6 its

Private Sub Text1_KeyDown(KeyCode As Integer, Shift As Integer)
If KeyCode = vbKeyF7 Then
SendKeys (Text1.Text)
End If
End Sub
